channel.title: Colab on Ana Laura Diedrichs

item.title: R in google colab
item.description: You can have a simply empty R jupyter notebook in colab by using this link 1) URL: https://colab.research.google.com/#create=true&language=r, 2) or this short URL https://colab.to/r in your favourite browser.
